title: What packages are needed to use CommsClient?

content.raw:
What are the minimum packages that need to be installed inside of our docker image in order to use the CommsClient? I am referring to the [#!/osrf/subt/wiki/cloudsim\_architecture](#!/osrf/subt/wiki/cloudsim_architecture) page and the first picture, where it says that ign-transport is to be used besides ROS. We’d like to have minimum outside dependencies inside of our solution container \(thus less things that can break\).

BTW: that’s also why we were asking to update communitation api \([#!/osrf/subt/issues/35/replace-commsclient-by-ros-topic-s](#!/osrf/subt/issues/35/replace-commsclient-by-ros-topic-s)\) to use what is provided in ROS, so that we have to deal only with one dependency on our side.
content.html:
What are the minimum packages that need to be installed inside of our docker image in order to use the CommsClient? I am referring to the #!/osrf/subt/wiki/cloudsim_architecture page and the first picture, where it says that ign-transport is to be used besides ROS. We’d like to have minimum outside dependencies inside of our solution container (thus less things that can break).

BTW: that’s also why we were asking to update communitation api (#!/osrf/subt/issues/35/replace-commsclient-by-ros-topic-s) to use what is provided in ROS, so that we have to deal only with one dependency on our side.
